poll.description: This accolade goes to the character that came out on top this week. Who stood out? Who's holding all the cards?
They're pulling all the strings. They're setting all the traps. Who was this weeks most manipulative character?
From razor-sharp barbs to dexterous dialog, who spoke the line that stood head and shoulders above the rest?
It was a scene that took your breath away, or had you screaming at the TV set. But which one left a lasting impression?
For you, it was the crowning moment of the episode. In fact, if it were any better, you'd have given it a standing ovation.
That look. The one that burned deep into someone's soul, or sent daggers flying across the room. Who had this episode's blackest scowl?
